analyzed: bhartuḥ mitram priyam a vidhave viddhi mām ambuvāham
tad saṃdeśaiḥ hṛdaya nihitaiḥ āgatam tvad samīpam

original: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śramyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ %
analyzed: yaḥ vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śramyatām proṣitānām
mandra snigdhaiḥ dhvanibhiḥ abalā veṇi mokṣa utsukāni
iti ākhyāte pavanatanayam maithilī iva unmukhī sā
tvām utkaṇṭhā ucchvasita hṛdayā vīkṣya sambhāvya ca eva

original: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā saumya sīmantinīnāṃ %
analyzed: śroṣyati asmāt param avahitā saumya sīmantinīnām
kānta udantaḥ suhṛd upanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃcid ūnaḥ  /

original: tām āyuṣman mama ca vacanād ātmanaś copakartuṃ $
analyzed: tām āyuṣmat mama ca vacanāt ātmanaḥ ca upakartum
brūyāḥ evam tava sahacaraḥ rāmagiri āśrama sthaḥ

original: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ %
analyzed: a vyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvām viyuktaḥ
pūrva ābhāṣyam sulabha vipadām prāṇinām etat eva
aṅgena aṅgam pratanu tanunā gāḍha taptena taptam
sa asreṇa aśru drutam avirata utkaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitena
uṣṇa ucchvāsam samadhikatara ucchvāsinā dūra vartī

original: saṃkalpais tair viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ // 2.42 //
analyzed: saṃkalpaiḥ taiḥ viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddha mārgaḥ

original: śabdākhyeyaṃ yadapi kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt $
analyzed: śabda ākhyeyam yat api kila te yaḥ sakhīnām purastāt
karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūt ānana sparśa lobhāt
saḥ u tikrāntaḥ śravaṇa viṣayam locanābhyām adṛṣṭaḥ
tvām utkaṇṭhā viracita padam mad mukhena idam āha
śyāmāsu aṅgam cakita hariṇī prekṣaṇe dṛṣṭi pātam
vaktra chāyām śaśini śikhinām barha bhāreṣu keśān
utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadī vīciṣu bhrū vilāsān

original: hantaikasmin kvacid api na te caṇḍi sādṛśyam asti // 2.44 //
analyzed: hanta ekasmin kvacid api na te caṇḍi sādṛśyam asti  /
tvām ālikhya praṇaya kupitām dhātu rāgaiḥ śilāyām

original: ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum &
analyzed: ātmānam te caraṇa patitam yāvat icchāmi kartum

original: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālupyate me %
analyzed: asraiḥ tāvat muhur upacitaiḥ dṛṣṭiḥ ālupyate me

original: krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ // 2.45 //
analyzed: krūraḥ tasmin api na sahate saṃgamam nau kṛtāntaḥ
dhārā sikta sthala surabhiṇaḥ tvad mukhasya asya bāle

original: dūrībhūtaṃ pratanum api māṃ pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti &
analyzed: dūrībhūtam pratanum api mām pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti
gharma ante smin vigaṇaya katham vāsarāṇi vrajeyuḥ
diś saṃsakta pravitata ghana vyasta sūrya ātapāni
mām ākāśa praṇihita bhujam nirdaya āśleṣa hetoḥ

original: labdhāyās te katham api mayā svapnasandarśaneṣu &
analyzed: labdhāyāḥ te katham api mayā svapna sandarśaneṣu

original: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ %
analyzed: paśyantīnām na khalu bahuśas na sthalīdevatānām
muktā sthūlāḥ taru kisalayeṣu aśru leśāḥ patanti
bhittvā sadyas kisalaya puṭān devadāru drumāṇām
ye tad kṣīra sruti surabhayaḥ dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ
āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādri vātāḥ

original: pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti // 2.47 //
analyzed: pūrvam spṛṣṭam yadi kila bhavet aṅgam ebhiḥ tava iti

original: saṃkṣipyante kṣana iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmā triyāmā $
analyzed: saṃkṣipyante kṣanaḥ iva katham dīrgha yāmā triyāmā

original: sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt &
analyzed: sarva avasthāsu ahar api katham manda manda ātapam syāt
ittham cetaḥ caṭula nayane durlabha prārthanam me
gāḍha uṣmābhiḥ kṛtam aśaraṇam tvad viyoga vyathābhiḥ
nanu ātmānam bahu vigaṇayan ātmanā eva avalambe

original: tatkalyāṇi tvam api nitarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam &
analyzed: tat kalyāṇi tvam api nitarām mā gamaḥ kātara tvam

original: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā %
analyzed: kasya atyantam sukham upanatam duḥkham ekāntataḥ vā

original: nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa // 2.49 //
analyzed: nīcais gacchati upari ca daśā cakra nemi krameṇa
śāpa antaḥ me bhujaga śayanāt utthite śārṅgapāṇau

original: śeṣān māsān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā &
analyzed: śeṣān māsān gamaya caturaḥ locane mīlayitvā

original: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ %
analyzed: paścāt āvām viraha guṇitam tam tam ātma abhilāṣam
nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇata śarad candrikāsu kṣapāsu

original: bhūyaścāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me $
analyzed: bhūyas ca āha tvam api śayane kaṇṭha lagnā purā me

original: nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvaraṃ viprabuddhā &
analyzed: nidrām gatvā kim api rudatī sa svaram viprabuddhā

original: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me %
analyzed: sa antarhāsam kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataḥ ca tvayā me

original: dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti // 2.51 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvam mayā iti
etasmāt mām kuśalinam abhijñāna dānāt viditvā

original: mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ &
analyzed: mā kaulīnāt asita nayane mayi aviśvāsinī bhūḥ

original: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahe dhvaṃsinas te tv abhogād %
analyzed: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahe dhvaṃsinaḥ te tu abhogāt
iṣṭe vastuni upacita rasāḥ prema rāśībhavanti
āśvāsya evam prathama viraha udagra śokām sakhīm te
śailāt āśu trinayana vṛṣa utkhāta kūṭāt nivṛttaḥ
sa abhijñāna prahita kuśalaiḥ tad vacobhiḥ mama api
prātar kunda prasava śithilam jīvitam dhārayethāḥ

original: kaccit saumya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me $
analyzed: kaccit saumya vyavasitam idam bandhu kṛtyam tvayā me

original: pratyādeśān na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ kalpayāmi &
analyzed: pratyādeśāt na khalu bhavataḥ dhīra tām kalpayāmi
niḥśabdaḥ u pi pradiśasi jalam yācitaḥ cātakebhyaḥ
pratyuktam hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsita artha kriyā eva
